Sections.Text: The terrible life-giving name, I have snatched it from the dark powers. But the hour is not yet struck midnight. Megalonumos is not ready.
My defenses will not hold the Tyree assault at bay five minutes, let alone the hours I need.
I can use the life-giving name to put my own soul into Megalonumos, activating him now.
I can invoke the pact I made two decades past. A weaker Megalonumos would rise early to protect me.
Or you, my loyal servant. You would have a body once again, more powerful than any flesh.
Nothing could make him more powerful. I'll live on in his ramshackle form forever.
I call on those dark powers for an even greater boon than theyâ€™ve already granted.
Arise, my servant! Fulfill your duty to me and destroy those you once called kin.
